sentences.english: Otherwise, they may just spend the weekend ruminating over the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 否则他们只能用一个周末的时间来回味裁员的苦果。

sentences.english: When you finally survive the week, you don't want to end up having to eat crow pie.
sentences.chinese: 这样，当你熬过了这周，你就不必自食苦果了。

sentences.english: The weed of crime bears bitter fruit.
sentences.chinese: 罪行的稗草会结出苦果。

sentences.english: Twice I had to swallow hard and furtively dry the tears.
sentences.chinese: 两次我都是默默地暗吞苦果，偷偷地擦干眼泪。

sentences.english: For many, this may be a bitter pill to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 对许多人来说，这可能是自食苦果。
